official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for two additional members of the Physician Payment Review Commission.

summary.text: Amends part B (Supplementary Medical Insurance) of title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to provide for the appointment of two additional members to the Physician Payment Review Commission. (Currently, there are 11 Commission members.)

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide for two additional members of the Physician Payment Review Commission.
